explains: n. 结合，同时发生；连词；（占星术中两个天体的）相合
wordGroup: in conjunction with 连同，共同；与…协力

sentences.en: Textbooks are designed to be used in conjunction with classroom teaching.
sentences.cn: 教科书被设计成与课堂教学配合使用。

sentences.en: The system is designed to be used in conjunction with a word processing program.
sentences.cn: 本系统是为与文字处理软件配合使用而设计的。
